item.title: Introduction to nestjs
item.description: 代码分析 入口main.ts import { NestFactory } from '@nestjs/core'; import { ApplicationModule } from './app.module'; async function bootstrap() { const app = await NestFactory.create(ApplicationModule); await app.listen(3000); } bootstrap(); NestFactory构造 public async create( module: any, serverOrOptions?: any, options?: NestApplicationOptions, ): Promise< INestApplication & (INestExpressApplication | INestFastifyApplication) > { const
